landline.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a telephone connection that uses wires, as opposed to a mobile phone
landline.translation[0].definitions[0].e: I'll be at home, so you can call me on the landline.
landline.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a telephone connection that receives a signal from wires attached to poles or from a cable (=thick wire) under the ground
landline.translation[1].definitions[0].e: I’ll call you back on the landline, it’s cheaper.
